name: guitar-website
description: Website to manage crud features for hypothetical guitar inventory.

scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run install-client && npm run install-server && npm run build
scripts.devstart: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.serverstart: concurrently "cd backend && npm run serverstart" "cd client && npm start"
